definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: tread, march (Aram. [[דְּרַח]], drek; NH Hiph. lead, conduct; Ar. IV. 0drk reach, overtake; Eth. daraka: be rough, serve (from calcavit, Di); madrak: threshold, vestibule)—
tread, march, march forth, abs., [[תִּדְרְכִי נַפְשִׁי עׂז]] Ju Jdg 5:21; cf. [[דָּרַךְ כּוֹכָב מִיַּעֲקׂב]] Nu 24:17 (poem) a star hath marched forth from Jacob.

tread upon (land), sq. [[בְּ]] De 1:36, De 11:25 (subj. pers.), Jos 14:9 (subj. [[רֶגֶל]]) cf. De 11:24 = Jos 1:3 (subj. [[כַּף רַגְלְכֶם]]); tread in a path, sq. [[בְּ]] Is 59:8 (fig. of mode of life); tread in (on) the sea, sq. [[בְּ]] Hb Hab 3:15 (but txt. dub. cf. VB); of an invader [[יִדְרׂח בְּאַרְמְנוֹתֵינוּ]] Mic 5:4 (‖[[יׇבוֹא בְּאַרְחֵנוּ]]); [[בִּגְבלֵינוּ]] ´[[יִד]] v:Mic 5:5 (‖ id.); sq. [[עַל]] 1Sa 5:5 ([[עַל־מִפְתַּן דָּגוֹן]]); Ps 91:3 ([[עַל־שַׁחַל וׇפֶתֶן]]); esp. (poet.) [[עַל־בָּמֳו֠תֵי אֶרֶץ]] Mic 1:3, of ´[[י]], so Am 4:13, & ([[עַל־בָּמֳתֵי יׇ֑ם]]) Job 9:8; of Isr. treading on heights of enemies, i.e. subduing them De 33:29. Once sq. acc. ([[אֲשֶׁר]] ref. [[אׂרַח]]) Job 22:15. In technical senses

tread wine- (or oil-) press, sq. acc. [[יְקָבִים]] Job 24:11 (‖[[יַחְהִירוּ]]), [[גִּתּוֹת]] Ne 13:15; sq. acc. of thing pressed [[עֲנׇבִים]] ´[[ד]] Am 9:13; also of product [[וְתִירוֹשׁ]]…[[תִּדְרׂח־זַיִת ]] Mic 6:15; [[יַיִן בַּיְקָבִים לאׁ יִדְרׂח]] [[הַדּׂרֵח]] Is 16:10; sq. [[בְּגַת]] Is 63:2 (in sim.); abs. Je 25:30 (sim.) Je 48:33; fig. of judgment Is 63:3 sq. acc. [[פּוּרָה]] winepress, subj. ´[[י]], cf. v:Is 63:3 [[וְאֶדְרְכֵם בְּאַפִּי]] (‖[[רמס]]), i.e. tread them down; so [[גַּת דָּרַךְ אֲדׂנׇי]] [[לִבְתוּלַת בַּת־יְהוּדָה]]La 1:15.

tread (i.e. bend) the bow, sq. acc. [[קֶשֶׁת]] Je 51:8 ([[אֶל־יִדְרׂח יד֠רך הַדּׂרֵח]] [[קַשְׁתּוֹ]]); fig. of assaults of wicked Ps 11:2, Ps 37:14, of judgments of ´[[י]] Ps 7:18, La 2:4, La 3:12; also fig. of Judah as bow in hand of ´[[י]], [[כִּי דָרַכְתִּי לִי יְהוּדָה]] Zec 9:13 (‖[[קֶשֶׁת מִלֵּאתִי אֶפְרַיִם]]); twice in like mng. c. obj. [[חֵץ]] arrow Ps 58:8 (but on txt. cf. Che:crit. n.) Ps 64:4; [[דּׂרְכֵי קֶשֶׁת]] = bow-benders, archers Je 50:14, Je 50:29, 1Ch 5:18, 1Ch 8:40, 2Ch 14:7; [[קֶשֶׁת דְּרוּכָה]] bent bow Is 21:15; [[קַשְׁתַׂתָיו דְּרֻכוֹת]] Is 5:28.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְהִדְרִיח]] Is 11:15; sf. [[הִדְרִיכָהּ]] Je 51:33 (where many Inf. cstr.) cf. RS:J Ph xvi. (1888) 72; 1 S. sf. [[הִדְרַכְתִּיךָ]] Pr 4:11; 3 pl. sf. [[הִדְרִיכָֻהוּ]] Ju Jdg 20:43, [[הִדְרִיכוּהוּ]] Job 28:8; Impf. [[יַדְרֵח]] Ps 25:9, sf. [[יַדְרִכֵנִי]] Hb Hab 3:19; [[וַיַּדְרִיכֵם]] Ps 107:7; 1 S. sf. [[אַדְרִיכֵם]] Is 42:16; [[וַיַּדְרְכוּ]] Je 9:2 (cf. Ges:§ 53, 3, R 4); Imv. ms. sf. [[הַדְרִיכֵנִי]] Ps 25:5, Ps 119:35; Inf. cstr. v. supr.; Pt. sf. [[מַדְרִיכְךָ]] Is 48:17; —
tread, tread down, of treading down enemy in battle Ju Jdg 20:43; of treading a path Job 28:8; levelling threshing-floor Je 51:33 (all sq. sf.).

definitions.title: Qal 4
definitions.body: ), only fig. [[וַיַּדְרְכוּ אֶת־לְשׁוֹנׇם קַשְׁתָּם]] [[שֶׁקֶר]] Je 9:2 and they have bent their tongue as their bow in falsehood.

causat., cause to tread or march, lead, returning exiles Is 11:15 (subj. ´[[י]]; no obj. expressed); cf. [[וַיַּדְרִיכֵם בְּדֶרֶח]] [[יְשָׁרָה]] Ps 107:7 and he led them in a straight way; v. also Is 42:16 (‖[[הוֹלִיח]]); with a moral application [[הִדְרַכְתִּיךָ בְּמַעְגְּלֵי־ישֶׁר]] Pr 4:11; cf. Ps 119:35 [[הַדְרִיכֵנִי בִּנְתִיב מִחְוֹתֶיךָ]] lead me in the path of thy commandments; Ps 25:5 [[בַּאֲמִתֶָּךָ]] (‖[[לַמְּדֵנִי ]]) cf. v:Ps 25:9 [[בַּמִּשְׁפָּט]] ([[יְלַמֵּד דַּרְכּוֹ]], Is 48:17 [[בְּדֶרֶח תֵּלֵח]] (‖[[לְהוֹעִל מְלַמֶּדְךָ ]]); once of giving security & triumph [[עַל־בָּמוֹתַי יַדְרִכֵנִי]] Hb Hab 3:19 upon mine heights he maketh me tread (cf.
